Title: Coach Steven
Writer: Raven Molisee, Paul Villeco, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: Coach Steven: After seeing Garnet and Amethyst fuse together into the powerful Sugilite, Steven becomes determined to get super strong.
